smallShields.Name: Gilded Iron Shield
smallShields.Lore:
Small metal roundshield. Heavier than a wooden shield, 
but boasts higher damage negation.

smallShields.Name: Riveted Wooden Shield
smallShields.Lore:
Small wooden roundshield that has been reinforced with metal. 
It is light and easy to handle, but cannot offer the damage negation of a true metal shield.

smallShields.Name: Rift Shield
smallShields.Lore: Small metal roundshiled depicting a sinister rift.

smallShields.Name: Pillory Shield
smallShields.Lore: Pillory made to punish serious felons, used as a shield. Though made of good, sturdy wood, it is only a makeshift tool and performs as such.

smallShields.Name: Ice Crest Shield
smallShields.Lore:
Small metal roundshield. Heavier than a wooden shield,
but boasts higher damage negation.

smallShields.Name: Coil Shield
smallShields.Lore:
Armament designed for gladitorial combat. rises above its peers as a particularly showy specimen. 
The sculpted bronze snake is a poisonous breed, boosting the weilder's resistance to poison.

smallShields.Name: Shield of the Guilty
smallShields.Lore: Shield made to venerate a maiden whose eyes were crushed by Briars of Sin before being reborn in these lands.

smallShields.Name: Man-Serpent's Shield
smallShields.Lore: Small copper dome-shaped roundshield carried by the man-serpents of Mt. Gelmir.

smallShields.Name: Scripture Wooden Shield
smallShields.Lore: A small, wooden roundshield. It is light and easy to handle, but cannot offer the damage negation of a metal shield.

smallShields.Name: Blue-White Wooden Shield
smallShields.Lore:
Small wooden roundshield that has been reinforced with metal. 
It is light and easy to handle, but cannot offer the damage negation
of a true metal shield.

smallShields.Name: Smoldering Shield
smallShields.Lore:
Small shield made upon Mt. Gelmir forged from uncooling lava. 

Resists frost with its heat, and can even be used to deal fire damage if wielded as a weapon.

smallShields.Name: Spiralhorn Shield
smallShields.Lore:
Small shield of antlers arranged in an eddy-like pattern. If used to attack a foe, the shield's antlers inflict blood loss. 
 
Once given to a Tarnished warrior who cultivated close ties to the ancestral followers. Though the effect is only slight, it boosts immunity, robustness, and focus.

smallShields.Name: Red Thorn Roundshield
smallShields.Lore:
A small, wooden roundshield. 
It is light and easy to use, but cannot offer the damage negation of a metal shield. 

Its emblem is an ancient red thorn design. 
Though it isn't much, itï¿½boosts fire damage negation.

smallShields.Name: Buckler
smallShields.Lore:
A small metal roundshield. 
The bump in the center enables parrying techniques.

smallShields.Name: Perfumer's Shield
smallShields.Lore:
Golden shield used by the perfumers of Leyndell during military service. 

Made to be thin and light of weight, even those lacking strength can employ this immunity-boosting shield.

smallShields.Name: Iron Roundshield
smallShields.Lore: An ordinary small roundshield made of metal. Heavier than a wooden shield, but boasts higher damage negation.

smallShields.Name: Rickety Shield
smallShields.Lore: A creaky old wooden shield, circular in shape. Roughly reinforced with vines or some such.
